definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: You just swaller some of it once—you'll see.
sentences.chinese: 要不然，你現在就吞點下肚，有你好看的。

sentences.english: The monk can run away, but he can run with the temple.
sentences.chinese: 要不然跑得了和尚，跑不了廟啊。

sentences.english: You can die or you can eat something else.
sentences.chinese: 可以喫點別的東西，要不然會死去。

sentences.english: Or it will be erratic and annoying right through, like a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 要不然就是像一隻難以捉摸令人厭煩的小雞。

sentences.english: Failure results in a bricked computer. Don't blame me.
sentences.chinese: 要不然失敗會導致計算機崩潰，到時候別責怪我。

sentences.english: Because what else could I do?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩斯說，“要不然我還能怎麼做？

sentences.english: Seize the chance，otherwise you will regret it.
sentences.chinese: 抓住機會，要不然你會後悔的。

sentences.english: Don't be late again, or you'll ask for it.
sentences.chinese: 別再遲到了，要不然你會自找苦喫的。

sentences.english: Work hard when (you are) young , or you'll regret.
sentences.chinese: 趁年輕要努力學習，要不然你會後悔的。

sentences.english: Take the bus or stay at home.
sentences.chinese: 你要麼坐公車要不然就待在家裏。

sentences.english: You'd better stop hitting my brother, or else…
sentences.chinese: 你小子別再打我弟弟了，要不然。

sentences.english: You must hurry up, or you'll be late today.
sentences.chinese: 快點吧，要不然你今天準會遲到。

sentences.english: Beverly: Why else would you grow a, pancreas in a enaged gibbon?
sentences.chinese: 要不然爲啥在青年長臂猿身上培育胰腺？

sentences.english: I have to turn off the lights, or else my father will get really angry.
sentences.chinese: 我必須關上燈，要不然我父親真要生氣了。

sentences.english: You should thank the timely rescue; without it you would already be dead.
sentences.chinese: 搶救及時，要不然你早就吹燈了。

sentences.english: Why don't you play a game of soccer?
sentences.chinese: 要不然你們去賽一場足球吧？

definition: if it were not for/but for
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
when the moment comes/at that time
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
